程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim

类 Log

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Log
public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
Logger used for performing logging of the simulation process. It provides the ability to substitute the output stream by any OutputStream subclass.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static void disable()
    Disables the output.
    static void enable()
    Enables the output.

    Prints a string formated as in String.format().

    Prints a string formated as in String.format(), followed by a new line.

    Gets the output stream.

    Checks if the output is disabled.

    Prints the message passed as a non-String object.
    static void print​(java.lang.String message)
    Prints a message.
    static void printConcat​(java.lang.Object... messages)
    Prints the concatenated text representation of the arguments.
    static void printConcatLine​(java.lang.Object... messages)
    Prints the concatenated text representation of the arguments and a new line.
    static void printLine()
    Prints an empty line.
    static void printLine​(java.lang.Object message)
    Prints the message passed as a non-String object and a new line.
    static void printLine​(java.lang.String message)
    Prints a message and a new line.
    static void setDisabled​(boolean _disabled)
    Sets the disable output flag.
    static void setOutput​(java.io.OutputStream _output)
    Sets the output stream.
